ModMetaData.name: Mod List Backup
ModMetaData.author: scuba156
ModMetaData.description:
Backup and restore the currently loaded mods into 20 different nameable slots! Import a mod list from a save file! Never have to lose your mod order again!
Features: -Search -Rename Mods -Colorize Mod Names -Multiple Mod Lists -Install` Steam Mods for offline use -Import Active Mods From Save File
Requires: HugsLib 5.0+
Version: 2.0
